HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL & DPD: 89 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. Česká pošta – Balík do ruky: 79 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. Pro objednávky pod 300 Kč se připočítává balné 24 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Doručení obvykle následující pracovní den. DPD: úterý - středa.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL & Zásilkovna: 69 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. DPD Pickup, GLS & Balíkovna: 65 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. Pro objednávky pod 300 Kč se připočítává balné 24 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: PPL & Zásilkovna: 69 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. DPD Pickup, GLS & Balíkovna: 65 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. Pro objednávky pod 300 Kč se připočítává balné 24 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 15 Kč pro objednávky od 300 Kč. Pro objednávky pod 300 Kč je cena 15 Kč + 24 Kč balné.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Aktin.cz offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, and in-store pickup in Czechia.
PROVIDERS: A wide range of carriers is available, including PPL, DPD, Zásilkovna, GLS, and Česká pošta (Balík do ruky, Balíkovna).
PRICING: Free shipping is offered on all orders over 1,499 Kč. For orders between 300 Kč and 1,499 Kč, prices range from 65 Kč to 89 Kč depending on the carrier. In-store pickup costs 15 Kč. A 24 Kč packaging fee is applied to all shipped orders under 300 Kč to discourage small, frequent orders.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery is generally very fast, usually the next working day. Cash on delivery (COD) is available for a 49 Kč fee but is not offered for DPD Pickup points or for orders exceeding 10,001 Kč. Zásilkovna has a weight limit of 15 kg.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is exceptionally clear, well-organized, and transparent. Each delivery method has a dedicated section with a pricing table based on order value, estimated delivery times, and available payment methods, making it very easy for customers to understand their options.
